title: Rank Badge, before 1644
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic yarns
Technique: plain weave with discontinuous wefts (slit tapestry or k'ossu)
description: Ming Sixth Rank square, civilian category, showing pair of flying egrets among cloudbands, in black, blue, green, yellow, vermilion, pale pink, and white on a gold ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Rank Badge, before 1644.
before 1644. Medium: silk, metallic yarns
Technique: plain weave with discontinuous wefts (slit tapestry or k'ossu). Gift of John Pierpont Morgan. 1902-1-432.
